statements: SELECT * FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM VisitorInformation ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_company, visitor_email FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visit_purpose = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visitor_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visit_purpose FROM VisitorInformation ORDER BY visitor_name ASC, visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visit_purpose FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visit_purpose LIKE '%Meeting%';
SELECT * FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visitor_company IS NOT NULL ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email FROM VisitorInformation WHERE visitor_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY visitor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM visitors;
SELECT name, email FROM visitors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT phone_number, address FROM visitors WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM visit_logs WHERE purpose = 'Meeting' ORDER BY visit_datetime DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, log_description FROM visit_logs WHERE visitor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM visitors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM visitors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT address, name FROM visitors WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM visit_logs WHERE purpose = 'Meeting' ORDER BY visit_datetime DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, log_description FROM visit_logs WHERE log_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Visitors ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT vis.visit_id, vis.entry_time, vis.exit_time, aud.log_timestamp, aud.event_description FROM Visits vis JOIN AuditLogs aud ON vis.visit_id = aud.visit_id;

SELECT v.first_name AS VisitorFirstName, v.last_name AS VisitorLastName, a.log_timestamp AS LogTimestamp, a.event_description AS EventDescription FROM Visitors v JOIN AuditLogs a ON v.visitor_id = a.visitor_id;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Visitors;
SELECT * FROM Visits WHERE entry_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT v.visitor_id, v.first_name, v.last_name, v.email, vl.log_timestamp, vl.event_description FROM Visitors v JOIN Visits vs ON v.visitor_id = vs.visitor_id JOIN AuditLogs vl ON vs.visit_id = vl.visit_id;
SELECT COUNT(visitor_id) AS total_visitors FROM Visitors;
SELECT v.first_name, v.last_name, vl.log_timestamp FROM Visitors v LEFT JOIN Visits vs ON v.visitor_id = vs.visitor_id LEFT JOIN AuditLogs vl ON vs.visit_id = vl.visit_id WHERE vs.exit_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email FROM Visitors ORDER BY visitor_name ASC;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email, visit_date FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email, visit_date FROM Visitors WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_timestamp, visit_status FROM Visitors JOIN Visits ON Visitors.visitor_id = Visits.visitor_id;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email, visitor_phone_number FROM Visitors WHERE visit_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT visitor_name, visit_purpose, visit_status FROM Visitors JOIN Visits ON Visitors.visitor_id = Visits.visitor_id WHERE visit_status = 'Approved';

SELECT visitor_name, log_timestamp, log_activity FROM Visitors JOIN Visits ON Visitors.visitor_id = Visits.visitor_id JOIN VisitLogs ON Visits.visit_id = VisitLogs.visit_id WHERE Visitors.visitor_name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT visitor_name, visit_timestamp, username, user_role FROM Visitors JOIN Visits ON Visitors.visitor_id = Visits.visitor_id JOIN SecurityUsers ON Visitors.visitor_id = SecurityUsers.user_id WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Visitor;
SELECT name, email FROM Visitor ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM VisitLog WHERE reason = 'Meeting';
SELECT visitor_id, visit_datetime FROM VisitLog WHERE visit_datetime > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AuditLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Visitor WHERE name = 'John';
SELECT visitor_id, email FROM Visitor WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM VisitLog ORDER BY visit_datetime DESC;
SELECT v.name, v.email, vl.reason FROM Visitor v INNER JOIN VisitLog vl ON v.visitor_id = vl.visitor_id;
SELECT a.action, vl.visit_datetime, l.location_name FROM AuditLog a INNER JOIN VisitLog vl ON a.log_id = vl.log_id INNER JOIN Location l ON vl.visitor_id = l.location_id;
